title: minerjones

content: From maker Cypherhodl (krogothmanhattan) comes a nice selection of their coins:LOT 1: 2022 CypherHodl Â #18 0.0001BTC + NFT double load 3D printed coin, 55mmSTARTING BID: 0.0005BTCLOT 2: 2022 CypherHodl #13 200 Dogecoin + 0.002 Bitcoin double load brass coin, 68mm + NFTSTARTING BID: 0.0030BTCLOT 3: 2022 CypherHodl #13 1 Monero + 0.001 Bitcoin + NFT triple load brass coin, 68mmSTARTING BID: 0.0090BTCLOT 4: 2022 CypherHodl #13 1 Litecoin + 0.005 Bitcoin double load brass coin, 68mm + NFTSTARTING BID: 0.0090BTC*Each coin will come with address paper with QR code and printed out address for each crypto/coin/NFT*Winners for Lots 2 and Lot 4 will have to supply a separate Polygon address for their NFT*I should have some capsules for the coins by the time the auction ends!! *Link to the Cypher Hodl Timeline to help with any questions: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5412935STARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JANUARY 30rd, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
